title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2016 - TOULOUSE, FRANCE
description:
Global Day of CodeRetreat in Toulouse, France. 
The event will be hosted by HarryCow & sponsorized by Viseo. 
It will be facilitated by Antoine Cezar and Ludovic Pradel. 
Details and registration : https://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/Software-Craftsmanship-Toulouse/events/234434540/
